Package Management.title: Update package list
Package Management.description: Refreshes the list of available software packages from repositories. Always run this before installing or upgrading software to ensure you get the latest versions.

Package Management.title: Upgrade all software
Package Management.description: Updates all installed packages to their latest available versions. This keeps your system secure and up-to-date with bug fixes and new features.

System Info.title: Show system information
System Info.description: Displays your operating system, kernel version, and architecture. Useful to know what system you're running.

System Info.title: Check system uptime
System Info.description: Shows how long your system has been running and current load. Good for checking system stability.

System Info.title: Who am I?
System Info.description: Displays your current username. Helpful when switching between users.

Files & Folders.title: List all files (detailed)
Files & Folders.description: Shows all files including hidden ones, with permissions, size, owner, and modification date.

Files & Folders.title: Where am I?
Files & Folders.description: Shows the full path of your current directory. Never get lost again!

Files & Folders.title: Delete file
Files & Folders.description: Permanently deletes a file. Be careful, there's no trash bin!

Files & Folders.title: Delete folder
Files & Folders.description: ⚠️ DANGER: Deletes a directory and everything inside it recursively WITHOUT asking for confirmation. This action is irreversible!

Network.title: Test internet connection
Network.description: Sends 4 test packets to Google to check if internet is working. Shows response time (latency) in milliseconds and packet loss.

Network.title: Show my IP address
Network.description: Displays all network interfaces and their IP addresses. Look for 'inet' for IPv4 addresses.
